name: Quick Feet
summary: Increases the user's Speed by 50% if inflicted with a status.
viability: The only realistic user of Quick Feet is Ursaring, who can activate a Toxic Orb and then proceed to sweep with Swords Dance and Facade. Otherwise, Linoone can't get it yet, Mightyena has Moxie, Jolteon has Volt Absorb, and Granbull has Intimidate.
